item.description:
We'll meet at Kevin's home in Ellington for our monthly potluch dinner and business meeting. But don't let the words "business meeting" throw you off -- these really are social events! We just take a little time to plan our upcoming calendar of events and deal with any other club business.

The big business this month is the election of new officers for the new year! Please consider how you can help the club out.

So, come on out and bring your calendar and your ideas for future events.
item.name: Dinner and a meeting
